summary: The document is an FBI record detailing Santo Trafficante, Jr.'s activities in Madrid and Lisbon around the time of the JFK assassination. It highlights his contacts with Cuban attorney Rafael Garcia Bango regarding a property purchase and references a memorandum on Cuban revolutionary activities. The document also advises on the paraphrasing of intelligence for external dissemination to safeguard cryptographic systems.
key_findings: Santo Trafficante, Jr. was in Madrid from November 23 to November 28, 1963, coinciding with the JFK assassination.
He contacted Cuban attorney Rafael Garcia Bango in Madrid to discuss a potential property purchase.
Trafficante passed through Lisbon without exiting the airport.
A memorandum titled 'JUNTA REVOLUCIONARIA CUBANA (JURE), INTERNAL SECURITY=CUBA, NEUTRALITY MATTERS' dated August 5 is referenced.
The document recommends paraphrasing intelligence when shared outside the FBI to protect cryptographic systems.
